targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg("0") AS "ENTSO-E price"
FROM entsoe.query_day_ahead_prices
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("product_start",$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "ASSUME Price"
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$scenario') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY market_id, simulation, product_start
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(actual_load) AS "Historical Demand"
FROM entsoe.query_load
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(product_start, $__interval),
  avg(demand_volume) AS "Demand volume",
  node
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$scenario') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY 1, simulation, node
ORDER BY 1, node;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index, $__interval),
  avg(
    biomass + solar + "fossil_gas" + coalesce("fossil_brown_coal/lignite",0) + coalesce("fossil_oil",0) + "fossil_hard_coal" + geothermal + other + waste + coalesce("wind_offshore",0) + "wind_onshore" + coalesce(nuclear,0)
  ) as "ENTSO-E Generation"
FROM
  entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index)
  AND country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY
  1
ORDER BY
  1

panels.description: Overview of market results for the chossen market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(product_start, $__interval),
  avg(demand_volume) AS "Demand volume",
  avg(supply_volume) AS "Supply volume",
  avg(price) AS "Price",
  node
FROM market_meta
WHERE ("simulation" LIKE '$scenario') AND $__timeFilter(product_start)
GROUP BY 1, market_id, simulation, node
ORDER BY 1, node;

panels.title: Market Summary $market

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  wind_offshore+wind_onshore AS "ENTSO-E Wind"
  --wind_onshore AS "ENTSO-E Onshore"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

-- select average through time aggregation
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from (
select 
-- select sum over all units
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",'1h'),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from
(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data
  SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit_dispatch.simulation,
  technology,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
join power_plant_meta c on unit = c.index and c.simulation=unit_dispatch.simulation
where c.technology like '%wind%'
and
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(unit_dispatch.simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit_dispatch.simulation, c.technology, unit
ORDER BY 1) a
GROUP BY 1, technology
) a
GROUP BY 1, technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  avg(solar) AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

-- select average through time aggregation
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from (
select 
-- select sum over all units
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",'1h'),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from
(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data
  SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  unit_dispatch.simulation,
  technology,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
join power_plant_meta c on unit = c.index and c.simulation=unit_dispatch.simulation
where c.technology = 'solar'
and
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(unit_dispatch.simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit_dispatch.simulation, c.technology, unit
ORDER BY 1) a
GROUP BY 1, technology
) a
GROUP BY 1, technology

-- select average through time aggregation
select

avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology

select 
-- select sum over all units
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",'1h'),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from
(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data
  SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),

FROM unit_dispatch
join power_plant_meta c on unit = c.index and c.simulation=unit_dispatch.simulation
where c.technology = 'biomass'
and
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(unit_dispatch.simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit_dispatch.simulation, c.technology, unit
ORDER BY 1) a
GROUP BY 1, technology
) a
GROUP BY 1, technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,$__interval),
  ("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+hydro_water_reservoir) AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

-- select average through time aggregation
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),

technology

-- select sum over all units

sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from
(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data
  SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),

join power_plant_meta c on unit = c.index and c.simulation=unit_dispatch.simulation

and

GROUP BY 1, technology

FROM entsoe.query_generation

-- select average through time aggregation
select

avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from (
select 
-- select sum over all units
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",'1h'),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology

(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data

  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  nuclear AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  time as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology like 'nuclear'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_oil AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  time as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology like 'oil'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_hard_coal AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch", 
--sum("AMIRIS Awarded Energy"- "ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "Difference", 
--a."agent",
c."technology"
from
(SELECT
  time as "time",
  avg(power) AS "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
  SUBSTRING(unit,27) as "agent",
  simulation,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND

GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology like 'hard coal'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  fossil_gas AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE

ORDER BY 1

select

sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",

c."technology"

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND

GROUP BY 1, unit, power, simulation
ORDER BY 1) a
join power_plant_meta c on a.unit = c.index and c.simulation=a.simulation
where c.technology like 'gas'
GROUP BY 1, c.technology

-- select average through time aggregation
select 
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",$__interval),
avg("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from (
select 
-- select sum over all units
$__timeGroupAlias(a."time",'1h'),
sum("ASSUME Actual dispatch") as "ASSUME Actual dispatch",
technology
from
(
  -- select average per unit - remove duplicate sent data
  SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,'1h'),

  unit_dispatch.simulation,
  technology,
  unit
FROM unit_dispatch
join power_plant_meta c on unit = c.index and c.simulation=unit_dispatch.simulation
where c.technology like '%storage%'
and
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  LOWER(unit_dispatch.simulation) = '$scenario'
GROUP BY 1, unit_dispatch.simulation, c.technology, unit
ORDER BY 1) a
GROUP BY 1, technology
) a
GROUP BY 1, technology

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(index,1h),
  hydro_pumped_storage AS "ENTSO-E Data"
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Shows installed capacities in the simulation based on the fuel type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  NOW() as time_sec,
  SUM(max_power),
  technology
FROM power_plant_meta
WHERE "simulation" LIKE '$scenario'
GROUP BY technology, simulation;

panels.title: Installed Generation Capacities

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  index AS "time",
  biomass,
  "fossil_brown_coal/lignite" as lignite,
  "fossil_coal-derived_gas"+fossil_gas as gas,
  fossil_hard_coal as hard_coal,
  fossil_oil as oil,
  --fossil_oil_shale,
  --fossil_peat,
  geothermal,
  hydro_pumped_storage as hydro_storage,
  "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage" as hydro,
  nuclear,
  wind_offshore,
  wind_onshore,
  solar
FROM entsoe.query_installed_generation_capacity
WHERE
  country = 'DE'
  and index < $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  (biomass+solar+"fossil_gas"+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite"+"fossil_oil"+"fossil_hard_coal"+geothermal+other+waste+"wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore"+nuclear)*1e3 as total_entsoe
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  index AS "time",
  nuclear*1e3 as nuclear,
  "fossil_hard_coal"*1e3 as coal,
  ("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage"+hydro_water_reservoir)*1e3 as water,
  biomass*1e3 as bio,
  ("fossil_coal-derived_gas"+"fossil_gas")*1e3 as gas,
  (fossil_oil+coalesce(fossil_oil_shale,0)+coalesce(fossil_peat,0)+"fossil_brown_coal/lignite")*1e3 as lignite,
  ("wind_offshore"+"wind_onshore")*1e3 as wind,
  solar*1e3 as solar,
  (geothermal+other+waste)*1e3 as others
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = 'DE'
ORDER BY 1

select time, sum(volume) as "volume", tech FROM 
(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(start_time,$__interval),
  sum(accepted_volume) AS "volume", unit_id, pm.technology as tech
FROM market_orders mo
join power_plant_meta pm on pm.index=mo.unit_id and pm.simulation=mo.simulation
WHERE

  $__timeFilter(start_time) AND
  mo.simulation = '$scenario'

GROUP BY 1, unit_id, bid_id, pm.technology
ORDER BY 1

) a
group by 1, tech
ORDER BY 1, tech desc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("index",$__interval),
  avg(biomass) as biomass,
  avg(fossil_hard_coal) as fossil_hard_coal,
  avg(geothermal) as geothermal,
  avg(nuclear) as nuclear,
  avg("fossil_brown_coal/lignite") as "fossil_brown_coal/lignite",
  avg("fossil_coal-derived_gas") as "fossil_coal-derived_gas",
  avg("hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage") as "hydro_run-of-river_and_poundage",
  avg(waste) as waste,
  avg(solar) as solar,
  avg(wind_offshore) as wind_offshore,
  avg(wind_onshore) as wind_onshore,
  avg(other_renewable) as other_renewable,
  avg(hydro_water_reservoir) as hydro_water_reservoir,
  avg(fossil_gas) as fossil_gas
FROM entsoe.query_generation
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(index) AND
  country = '$country_benchmark'
group by 1
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition:
SELECT simulation
FROM market_meta
where simulation like 'amiris_%' or simulation like '%mastr_%'
list.description: filters amiris scenarios by schema name
list.name: scenario
list.query:
SELECT simulation
FROM market_meta
where simulation like 'amiris_%' or simulation like '%mastr_%'
